description.originalText: Ms. Cheryl has been an integral part of our family since September 2024. Our son absolutely adores her and the feeling is mutual. Ms. Cheryl is an innately kind human being, trustworthy, joyful, reliable, and heartfelt. My husband and I have a strong partnership with Ms. Cheryl and love that our son is able to start his mornings with her affection and care. In the past year, we’ve been able to easily communicate schedule changes, additional evenings for date night, and every day matters (e.g., son’s appetite, health, etc.). Ms. Cheryl is attentive and provides helpful recommendations about our son’s development and interest areas. We solicit her counsel and benefit from her education and experience in childcare/children’s development. We have an very easy rapport and solid foundation of trust. We highly recommend Ms. Cheryl and can’t sing her praises enough.

description.displayText: Cheryl had been an essential part in helping my wife and I find a phenomenal nanny for our daughter. She even helped our nanny generate a curriculum, geared towards our philosophical beliefs. How amazing is that? She really took the overwhelming daunting feeling away and replaced it with excitement. I would absolutely recommend Cheryl to anyone who is in need of guidance journeying through the childcare world.
description.originalText: Cheryl had been an essential part in helping my wife and I find a phenomenal nanny for our daughter. She even helped our nanny generate a curriculum, geared towards our philosophical beliefs. How amazing is that? She really took the overwhelming daunting feeling away and replaced it with excitement. I would absolutely recommend Cheryl to anyone who is in need of guidance journeying through the childcare world.

description.displayText: Cheryl looked after my daughter for 3 weeks after we moved into a new neighborhood - literally boxes weren't even unpacked yet. In a chaotic time for my family and I, Cheryl was self sufficient in finding activities to engage our daughter - from bringing her own busy board and painting kit - which my daughter loved! She took pictures while she was out at the park and always gave detailed accounts of the day - so we always felt informed. And if my daughter didn't eat her lunch, Cheryl took the initiative to make a meal that our daughter would eat. Cheryl looked after our daughter as if she was her own, with so much care as well as a focus on developmental activities. I would highly recommend her again.

description.displayText: Cheryl worked for our family for about 1.5 years and we had previously known her as our son's fabulous daycare teacher, so we were thrilled to have her working for us. She's extremely reliable, caring, and professional. She treats our 2 kids (ages 1.5 and 3) with love, keeps them engaged with educational activities, and has a good network of nannies/families in the area with which our kids can play and socialize safely. She's very Covid safe and fully vaccinated, which was important to our family as well. Our kids are now starting school, but we cannot recommend Cheryl enough!

description.displayText: Cheryl took care of my baby from when he was six months. She is kind, dependable and has a great attitude towards kids. She takes keen interest in understanding the baby under her care and in their growth and overall development. Highly recommend Cheryl!
description.originalText: Cheryl took care of my baby from when he was six months. She is kind, dependable and has a great attitude towards kids. She takes keen interest in understanding the baby under her care and in their growth and overall development. Highly recommend Cheryl!

description.displayText: Cheryl was prompt, responsive and polite during our communication.
description.originalText: Cheryl was prompt, responsive and polite during our communication.

description.displayText: Cheryl is amazing! From day 1 I was comfortable with her and she treated my children like her own. She took my kids to the pool and park and both my kids (2 & 9) were so sad when she would leave for the day. Caring, kind, considerate, nurturing and fun!
description.originalText: Cheryl is amazing! From day 1 I was comfortable with her and she treated my children like her own. She took my kids to the pool and park and both my kids (2 & 9) were so sad when she would leave for the day. Caring, kind, considerate, nurturing and fun!

description.displayText: Cheryl is really excellent caretaker at what she does. I had the pleasure of having her as a my mentor. She really goes out her way to help the children develop from intellectually to socially from setting up play dates with kids their age, to going to the library so the kids can have a love for reading. It was great being around her and just seeing her love for what she does.
description.originalText: Cheryl is really excellent caretaker at what she does. I had the pleasure of having her as a my mentor. She really goes out her way to help the children develop from intellectually to socially from setting up play dates with kids their age, to going to the library so the kids can have a love for reading. It was great being around her and just seeing her love for what she does.

description.displayText: Ms. Cheryl worked at our daycare facility for well over 1.5, maybe even two. She was always punctual! She was the first one willing to stay later when parents didn't show. She constantly thought of fun, creative and educational things for the children to do. She would dance and sing whole heartily when it was time to keep the kids entertained. She rarely ever complained however, when she did she always expressed herself professionally. Her smile and personality was infectious to everyone around her. She was very funny and sweet! Unfortunately her time with us ended because she was working on an internship for school. We would absolutely love to hire her again!
